description.value: Your team dashes about in a series of maneuvers that leave the enemy befuddled. Signal up to two squadmates affected by your commander's banner; these allies can Stride up to their Speed as a reaction. Each enemy they are adjacent to at any point during this movement must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|traits:emotion,fear,mental] save against your class DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure); this is an emotion, fear, and mental effect.
